songs.title: Pose (Salva Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh yeah, yeah, yeah
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah

(Pray for salvation)

[Verse 1]
Stir it up, porridge
Getting dope, so rich
Ah smoke it
And I ain't never liked a broke bitch

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh shit
So-oh-oh rich
Eyes low , I'm so loaded
Eyes, pose bitch

[Verse 2]
Take it off
Wanna see you work it like oh my god
And that thang is out I know you know
And you bounce it like I know you know
Bitch I know you know
Bitch I know you know
Bitch I know you know
Bitch I know you know
Bounce it like I know you know
Bitch I know you know
All my haters so so broke
Bitch I know you know
All these niggas so so broke
So so broke

[Breakdown]
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Pose!
Pose!

[Verse 3]
Yazzzzz bitch
Let me see you get it no no no
Flexin' I know that you with it
Pose bitch
Take a photo , flick, flick, flick, for fucking sho' doe
All you lame ass bitches is a no go
And if you with it go fuckin' loco, loco

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh shit
So-oh-oh rich
Eyes low , I'm so loaded
Eyes, pose bitch

[Breakdown]
Quiet down
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Quiet down

[Outro]
Pose, pose, pose, pose
